TEXT.TITLE: PUBLIC SERVICE CO OF N.H.<PNH> OMITS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Public Service Co of New Hampshire said its board voted to omit the quarterly dividend which would have been paid on May 15. The company said the omission is the thirteenth consecutive dividend omission. Reuter
